Title: Call The Doctor
Short Description: Step into the role of a surgeon and perform challenging operations
Long Description: Each game is built around medical scenarios inspired by specific cases ‚Äì for example, removing a brain tumor. The gameplay combines several mechanics: action pool management, dice allocation, and drawing. The game is largely based on real surgical procedures, medicines, instruments, and aims to be as realistic as possible.

Title: Concealed
Short Description: Solitaire reimagined as a ritual of prophecy.
Long Description: Concealed is a print and play solitaire card game that you can enjoy at your own pace, whether you're just looking to unwind or you're in the mood for a bit of a brain teaser.

Title: Teeny Tusslers
Short Description: Thematic movement pattern puzzles of bite-sized fun!
Long Description: A solo only small-box game where you strategically lead your goblin squad against other goblins by navigating conflict cards and solving movement puzzles.

Title: Rook & Ruin
Short Description: This highly thematic game features true deck-building using a multi-column table, but also provides print-ready card files. It's a solo dungeon-pager.
Long Description: I want to create games that are highly thematic, have interesting mechanics and - most importantly - are fun to play. I think this game brings something new, as it is a highly strategic and tactical puzzle featuring my favourite game as it's theme: chess. I am sure you will love it!

Title: Roll4Rum
Short Description: A piraty roll & write journey featuring multiple mechanics and themes over a year full of content.
Long Description: Embark on a journey across dangerous seas, uncharted islands, and thrilling encounters in Roll4Rum, the ultimate pirate roll-and-write game! Gather your dice, sharpen your pencils, and brace yourself for a voyage filled with rum and glory!

Title: LexaPics: solve words, reveal art
Short Description: LexaPics is a unique Print-and-Play puzzle game where solving a word search slowly reveals a hidden piece of art.
Long Description: LexaPics is a Print-and-Play puzzle game that turns word searches into art. As you highlight words, a hidden portrait or artwork emerges line by line. It blends the relaxing challenge of word games with the joy of creating art. Print in any size, replay endlessly, and explore many artistic themes. By backing, you unlock new puzzles, stretch goals, and exclusive rewards.

Title: Around the World in 15 Minutes (Print & Play Vacation Game)
Short Description: Travel the world, explore cities, and collect souvenirs in the second edition of this print & play vacation game! ‚úàÔ∏èüåé
Long Description: Around the World in 15 Minutes was the third game from No Box Games and we are launching a refreshed second edition under our new name Shiny Pigeon Printables. This version of the game includes some quality of life updates to the existing sheets, refinement to the solo mode, and a brand new map sheet where players can check out the wildlife of South America!

Title: Coin Pusher: Galactic Surge
Short Description: Just like in the arcade, you can push coins for maximum rewards in this roll and write PNP game for 1+ players.
Long Description: Welcome to Coin Pusher‚Äîthe roll & write game inspired by real-world coin pushing arcade games. From the makers of Dungeon Pages, Dangerous Space and Battle Pages comes an all new game genre based on those addictive coin drop games that encourage you to try 'just one more coin'.

Title: LoreFolke
Short Description: An original fantasy adventure tabletop roleplaying game (TTRPG ) of epic-sized adventures for faery-sized heroes.
Long Description: This project is for the completion of an original fantasy adventure tabletop roleplaying game and adventure setting entitled LoreFolke: A Tabletop Roleplaying Game of Epic-sized Adventures for Faery-sized Heroes. The game includes an original d20-based core rules system that uses the standard polyhedral dice set of d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, and d20.

Title: Loose In The Library
Short Description: Build a team of inspirational women from history and fiction to capture literary terrors in a cursed library.
Long Description: In Loose In The Library you build a team of inspirational women from fiction and history to capture escaped literary terrors in a cursed library. Can Athena and Marie Curie defeat Dracula? Or Little Red Riding Hood and Harriet Tubman capture a Kraken?

Title: Gun Trail
Short Description: A Spaghetti-Western Print-and-Play Graphic Adventure | Solo | Roll and Write | PNP |
Long Description: Gun Trail is a Spaghetti Western print-and-play graphic adventure game by Marco Salogni. Follow the trail. Beat the outlaws. Collect the bounty.  Step into the boots of a bounty hunter in a lawless land. Explore maps and face enemies with 2D6 dice combat, until the final showdown with the infamous Gatling Gang.

Title: GNOMES vs. CAPYBARAS: Woodland War
Short Description: A tactical card game of wits, whimsy, and woodland warfare
Long Description: Gnomes vs Capybaras is a 2 or 4 player strategic card game for ages 12+. Players gather resources like Courage, Berries, and Crystals, deploy quirky Workers, Soldiers, and Diplomats, and face off in locations alive with magic and mischief.

Title: Embers by Steven Aramini and Button Shy Games
Short Description: Defend your dwindling campfire against vicious monsters encroaching from the shadows. Solo only. $12 with free expansion.
Long Description: Embers is a solo-only game of survival. Use your heroes to defend against waves of encroaching monsters and keep your campfire lit.Each turn, spawn new monsters to face. Spend each hero‚Äôs action points to move them around the campfire, defend against monsters, upgrade their abilities, support each other, and forage for material to keep the fire going.

Title: Marsh Hallow
Short Description: A cooperative polyomino dungeon crawler flip and write where you play a marshmallow trying to save your family from a marshmallow cult.
Long Description: A cooperative polyomino dungeon crawler flip and write where you play a marshmallow trying to save your family from a marshmallow cult.

Title: The Kodama Institute - 2 player Roll & Write strategy game
Short Description: Manage a secretive company of scientists and arcanists that have uncovered ways to harness energy from the restless dead! Print-at-home
Long Description: Manage a secretive company of scientists and arcanists that have uncovered ways to harness energy from the restless dead! Print-at-home

Title: Capybara Crush
Short Description: Save cute critters with Capybara cards. A little puzzle every turn! 1-4 players per box.
Long Description: Save cute critters with Capybara cards. A little puzzle every turn! 1-4 players per box.

Title: Be... Brave? A Print and Play Party Game
Short Description: Sacrifice your friends before they sacrifice you in this chaotic card game for 2-5 players.
Long Description: Sacrifice your friends before they sacrifice you in this chaotic card game for 2-5 players.

Title: Essence - A Grim PnP RPG
Short Description: Essence - The Grim Expedition is a cooperative dark fantasy RPG for Print & Play,
Long Description: Essence - The Grim Expedition is a cooperative dark fantasy RPG for Print & Play, featuring strategic, node-based exploration inspired by games like Slay the Spire. Players navigate a branching path of dangerous events, where every step forward costs vital Essence ‚Äì This game blends tense, run-based pathfinding with deep tactical combat and a novel dice-to-action point system.

Title: 14ers
Short Description: Conquer 14,000-ft. mountains and build your card tableau to prove you're the ultimate climber!
Long Description: 14ers is a quick tableau-building card game for 1-4 players where you will take turns adding one "Climb card," each representing a different 14er, to your Hiker tableau by tucking the Climb card under one side to reveal an ability that can either help you gain more difficult & powerful Climb cards or score points. After 9 rounds, the player with the highest score is the winner!

Title: Monster Mash
Designer/Publisher: Benny Sperling / Roll and Write Revolution
Short Description: Mash monsters by chucking dice and assigning them to protect villages
Long Description:
The towns are overrun with monsters and you‚Äôve been called out to do what you do best, mash ‚Äòem! 
Monster Mash is a tactical roll and write with dice placement that utilizes one sheet for all players. Get a character card for asymmetric powers&scoring. 
The players roll 3 dice: 2 for monsters, 1 to block. 
Die value lets you mash 1-3 monsters. Leave their mark on adjacent monsters, score coins.

Title: Dungeon Pages: Underboss
Short Description: We've flipped the script! Become the evil underlord and battle the heroes from the original Dungeon Pages.
Long Description: Now you get to take the role of the devious evil lord bent on defeating those familiar heroes (from the original Dungeon Pages)! Place traps and monsters to thwart the adventurers while building your boss's climactic battle plan.

Title: Star Smugglers
Short Description: Get your ship combat-ready and set off on an interplanetary contraband adventure!
Long Description: Built on a refined combat system I invented earlier, the gameplay is faster, sharper, and more thrilling than ever. You‚Äôll dodge raiders, push your luck through dangerous routes, and dive into side quests while upgrading your ship and managing your crime level. Trade with allies, clash with rivals, and survive as long as your force field holds out.

Title: VoidRoll
Short Description: VoidRoll takes the strategic dice-assignment gameplay you love and transports it to the vast, dangerous, and opportunity-rich expanse of deep space.
Long Description: You are the captain of a small, independent starship, trying to make your name in a galaxy of powerful factions, cosmic anomalies, and forgotten secrets. Each month, a new sector of space will be released, presenting a unique map with its own challenges and stories to explore.

Title: Forest Guardians: Spirits of Nature
Short Description: A card game of hidden roles and deduction, where magical guardians protect the forest in quick games full of light strategy and charming art.
Long Description:
Guardians of the Forest is a beautifully illustrated fantasy card game that combines social deduction, hidden roles, and memory mechanics.
Each game feels new thanks to its modular setup and secret identities.
Support this project to bring the physical edition and bilingual Print & Play game to life, bringing a new community together with existing players.

Title: K√ñY
Short Description: A cozy 1-2 player village-building card game with just 18 cards.
Long Description:
K√ñY is an 18-card village builder with surprisingly tactical depth.
You're always choosing between two cards, deciding what to play and how to overlap it with existing cards (covering 0, 1, or 2 squares). Water can never be covered, so the landscape gradually reveals itself as lakes and streams that shape your scoring.
Every placement is a small puzzle with cascading consequences.

Title: Thermopylae: Last Stand
Short Description: A solo Print & Play wargame about the battle of Thermopylae in 480 BC.
Long Description: In Thermopylae: Last Stand, you step into the sandals of King Leonidas, commanding his 300 Spartan hoplites and their Greek allies in a desperate stand at the narrow pass of Thermopylae. Fast, dice-driven combat and a puzzle-like formation system put you in Leonidas‚Äô position, forcing you to weigh survival against glory.

Title: Midsummer Night: A Game of Partners, Paths, & Fairy Potions
Short Description: A puzzly, pocket-sized card game with red-reveal potions and whimsical hand-painted watercolor art for 1‚Äì2 players
Long Description: A puzzly, pocket-sized card game with red-reveal potions and whimsical hand-painted watercolor art for 1‚Äì2 players

Title: Cascadia: Alpine Lakes
Short Description: A standalone puzzly tile-layering follow-up to the award-winning game Cascadia, with beautiful artwork by Beth Sobel!
Long Description: A standalone puzzly tile-layering follow-up to the award-winning game Cascadia, with beautiful artwork by Beth Sobel!
